title: Command and Conquer.iso
description:
This is my first torrent.

What I have done is taken a game from here "Command and Conquer Generals 1 and 2 and installed it on my pc following the instructions and copying this and pasting that. Then I made an .ISO out of the working directory on my computer. My hope is that you will be able to just download this torrent and mount the .ISO on any virtual drive open the folder and run the game from the .EXE command without needing to install and such.

Thank you 

NCHermit

Please let me know if this works.
